scripts.build: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer  && cd dist/application && ren index.html client.ejs && move /Y C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\aplication\dist\application\client.ejs C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\beakend\views
scripts.buildMac: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && cd dist/application && mv index.html client.ejs && mv /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/wisechoice/aplication/dist/application/client.ejs /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/wisechoice/beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-test: ng build --aot --configuration=test --build-optimizer && mv dist/application/index.html dist/application/client.ejs && cp -r dist/application/client.ejs ../beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-prod: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && mv dist/application/index.html dist/application/client.ejs && cp -r dist/application/client.ejs ../beakend/views
